MAIN_CONTENT.COMPANY_2.DSCR_1: I have created and maintain an online store of luxury clothing from a Timshee brand.
MAIN_CONTENT.COMPANY_2.DSCR_2: I developed the user experience cycle, which starts with the main and items pages and ends with the cart and checkout pages.
MAIN_CONTENT.COMPANY_1.DSCR_1: I participated in the development of a Dashboard for supervision and maintenance of a videoconferencing system.
MAIN_CONTENT.COMPANY_1.DSCR_2: This Dashboard allows system administrators to analyze different system metrics, system performance, and also, the system's hardware....
MAIN_CONTENT.COMPANY_1.DSCR_3: The Dashboard has allowed administrators to reduce response time to problems by up to 50%
MAIN_CONTENT_TIMSHEE_DSCR: The online luxury clothing store. Created it from scratch with Django, React and TailwindCSS. A link below to demonstrate.
ABOUT_ME.TEXT: When I was a student, 20 years old, I didn't like programming. Until I started to learn programming myself. I started learning it with various web pages, which are dedicated to programming languages: C++, C#, JavaScript, Python and more. Actually I settled on Python and JS, and I have projects, which were built on these languages.
